title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-8.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-8.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The Federal requirements of 40 CFR Part
60, Subpart BBBB, incorporated by reference in Part 200 (see section
200.10, Table 2 of this Title)
apply to small municipal waste combustion Class I and Class II units that are
constructed on or before August 30, 1999. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
